care_team_subtitle: Share your functional wellness insights with people you trust — on your terms.
care_team_body: Your Care Team can see derived wellness signals only. No one ever sees your raw logs, journals, or Medical Vault.
no_supporters: No supporters added yet. You can invite a trusted friend, family member, or colleague to receive a simple high-level view of how you're doing.
no_trainers: No trainers or coaches connected. Share your functional wellness trends with a professional you already work with.
no_clinicians: No clinicians connected. If your clinician wants to support your wellness journey, you can invite them to see patterns and trends — not raw records.
supporter_explanation: Supporters see a simple high-level signal of how you're doing (for example: "doing well", "stable", or "struggling"). They do not see numbers, logs, or any Medical Vault data.
supporter_code_notice: This code lets one person connect to your APP Platform as a supporter for a limited time. You can revoke access at any time.
share_code_with_supporter: Share this code with your supporter:
supporter_footer: Supporters will only see a high-level wellbeing status — not your logs, journals, or Medical Vault.
share_with_trainer: Share trends with a Trainer or Coach
trainer_explanation: Trainers and coaches see your FWI, trends, and adherence patterns so they can support your goals. They do not see raw logs, journals, or Medical Vault contents.
trainer_trust_notice: You should only invite trainers or coaches you already trust.
share_code_with_trainer: Share this code with your trainer or coach:
trainer_visibility_notice: They will be able to view your Functional Wellness Index and trend insights. They will not see any raw entries or Medical Vault data.
clinician_explanation: Clinicians can see functional patterns and trends derived from your data. They do not see raw logs, PHI, or Medical Vault contents. Wellio is not an EMR/EHR and does not store clinical records.
clinician_trust_notice: Invite a clinician you already know and trust. They can use Wellio as a view into your patterns — not as a medical record system.
share_code_with_clinician: Share this code with your clinician:
clinician_visibility_notice: They will be able to view functional wellness patterns and trend insights. They will not see your logs, journals, or Medical Vault documents.
join_subtitle: Enter the invite code you received from a Wellio user.
joined_as_supporter: You've joined this individual's Care Team as a supporter. You will see a high-level wellbeing status only. No logs or medical documents.
joined_as_coach: You've joined this individual's Care Team as a trainer/coach. You will see their Functional Wellness Index, trends, and adherence patterns — never raw logs or Medical Vault contents.
joined_as_clinician: You've joined this individual's Care Team as a clinician. You will see functional patterns and trend insights — not PHI, logs, or Medical Vault data.
invalid_code: This code is invalid or has expired.
role_mismatch: This invite is not valid for your role. Please ask the individual to generate a new code.
already_connected: You are already connected to this person.
access_log_explanation: Whenever someone on your Care Team views your derived wellness insights (for example: FWI, trends, or adherence), we record it here. You always know who has accessed your data and when.
no_access_yet: No one has viewed your derived insights yet.
access_log_footer: This log covers derived insights only. Your raw logs, journals, and Medical Vault are never shared with anyone.
cmix_explanation: This conversation uses xx network's cMixx to hide who you're talking to and when — not just what you say.
